slide1.title: FeelBack
slide1.text: The research project FeelBack aims at supporting cancer patients to receive appropriate psychooncological care.

slide2.title: Standardized Instruments
slide2.text: For this purpose, FeelBack digitizes standardized paper-based screening instruments. Data is then collected with smart mobile devices (e.g., smartphones) and stored in a dedicated database.

slide3.title: Appropriate Care
slide3.text: When collecting data over a long period of time, patients with respective issues can be identified and get appropriate medical and psychological care.

slide4.title: Visual Analysis
slide4.text: The course of therapy of specific patients is visualized for medical staff in order to support their decision management.

slide5.title: Digital Documentation
slide5.text: Finally, FeelBack allows for documenting therapy in a digital manner and share this crucial information across different caregivers.
